data: “And yet,” Edward Henry Machin reflected as at six minutes to six he approached his own dwelling at the top of Bleakridge, “and yet—I don’t feel so jolly after all!”
"And yet," Edward Henry Machin reflected as at six minutes to six he approached his own dwelling at the top of Bleakridge, "and yet--I don't feel so jolly after all!"
The Old Adam: A Story of Adventure
